## ProjectionType enum

The type of projection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ProjectionType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Planar | <code>0</code> | A type of \[Projection\] with zero curvature. |
